description: Assesses research report with multiple sources

levels.4: Information is accurate, detailed, and comes from credible sources
levels.3: Information is mostly accurate with adequate detail
levels.2: Some inaccuracies or lack of detail; sources unclear

feedback_stems.strength: Your research was thorough and accurate, especially
feedback_stems.growth: Use credible sources and include specific details to strengthen your report

levels.4: Clear introduction, organized body sections with headings, and conclusion
levels.3: Report has clear sections and structure
levels.2: Some organization but sections unclear or missing
levels.1: No clear organization; information is jumbled

feedback_stems.strength: Your report was well-organized with clear sections
feedback_stems.growth: Use headings and topic sentences to organize your report into clear sections

levels.4: Information clearly paraphrased in own words; shows understanding
levels.3: Mostly in own words with some understanding shown
levels.2: Too close to original sources; minimal paraphrasing
levels.1: Copied directly from sources; no paraphrasing

feedback_stems.strength: You explained the information in your own words

levels.4: Conclusion synthesizes findings and highlights what's most important
levels.2: Conclusion is weak or just repeats introduction

feedback_stems.strength: Your conclusion effectively summarized your findings
feedback_stems.growth: Wrap up by telling readers the most important things you learned
